channel.title: Playername Length Serverside?

item.title: Playername Length Serverside?
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Any piece of code that kicks anyone who has a name longer than 15?

EDIT: Nvm figured lol

if (playerName.length() > 15) { disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); }

Read full topic
